segments.text: Excuse me , I would like to know something about this campus . Right now it seems very big and confusing ! I have no idea where I am going or what I am doing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a map of the campus ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have , but it doesn ’ t help me very much . I ’ m not very good at reading maps .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know where your classes are ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: More or less . I go to three different buildings , and always get there late . I feel so hopeless . I don ’ t know why I am late all the time . No one else seems to be .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's because you don't know the short cuts . You'll learn them after a while . I can show you the ropes .
segments.speaker: S2
